text: The 1883 New York Gothams season was the franchise's first season. The team replaced the Troy Trojans when the National League awarded its franchise rights to John B. Day. The team went 46–50, finishing in sixth place. ==Regular season== 1883 New York Gothams ===Season standings=== === Record vs. opponents === ===Roster=== {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
